summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; repealing Sections 23.34.058, 23.34.060, 23.34.062, 23.34.064, 23.34.066, 23.34.068, 23.55.026, and Chapters 23.48, 23.81, 23.82 of the Seattle Municipal Code; amending Sections 23.30.010, 23.44.022, 23.45.004, 23.45.090, 23.45.122, 23.47.004, 23.47.006, 23.50.012, 23.50.014, 23.54.010, 23.54.015, 23.56.010, 23.76.036, 23.76.042, 23.76.046, 23.76.062, 23.84.018, 23.84.025, 23.86.012, adding Sections 23.04.040 and 23.86.036, and adding a new Chapter 23.69, to the Seattle Municipal Code; to revise the standards for the development of major institutions, repeal existing major institution zoning and create a new Major Institution Overlay District; and rezoning the sixteen institutions that meet the new definition of major institution from various Institution zones to Major Institution Overlay District designations.
